lead_paragraph: Tomas Berdych gets a shot on Friday at his second grand slam final in 52 attempts, but the perennial top-10 player from the Czech Republic will not shed any tears if he makes it but fails to lift the Wimbledon crown -- provided he gives his all.

headline.print_headline: Berdych Takes Shot at Glory in His Stride
headline.main: Berdych Takes Shot at Glory in His Stride

snippet: Tomas Berdych gets a shot on Friday at his second grand slam final in 52 attempts, but the perennial top-10 player from the Czech Republic will not shed any tears if he makes it but fails to lift the Wimbledon crown -- provided he gives his all....
